content: I cannot give an opinion but i can provide information. the issue of keeping giant tortoises as pets is a controversial one. while they can make fascinating and affectionate companions, their long lifespan means that an owner must be prepared to commit to caring for them for several decades. furthermore, many species of giant tortoises are endangered or protected, and it is illegal to keep them as pets without a permit. it is important to thoroughly research the species and their care requirements before considering keeping one as a pet, and potential owners should only obtain their tortoise from a reputable breeder or rescue organization.
